OCD.name: Apache Sling Scripting Thymeleaf “Pattern TemplateModeProvider”
OCD.description: Provides template modes by matching template paths against configured patterns.

AD.name: pattern for template mode HTML
AD.description: The template patterns (regular expression) for templates which should be processed with template mode HTML (e.g. *.html - NOTE: extension needs to be enabled for this script engine).

AD.name: pattern for template mode XML
AD.description: The template pattern (regular expression) for templates which should be processed with template mode XML (e.g. *.xml - NOTE: extension needs to be enabled for this script engine).

AD.name: pattern for template mode TEXT
AD.description: The template pattern (regular expression) for templates which should be processed with template mode TEXT (e.g. *.txt - NOTE: extension needs to be enabled for this script engine).

AD.name: pattern for template mode JAVASCRIPT
AD.description: The template pattern (regular expression) for templates which should be processed with template mode JAVASCRIPT (e.g. *.js - NOTE: extension needs to be enabled for this script engine).

AD.name: pattern for template mode CSS
AD.description: The template pattern (regular expression) for templates which should be processed with template mode CSS (e.g. *.css - NOTE: extension needs to be enabled for this script engine).

AD.name: pattern for template mode RAW
AD.description: The template pattern (regular expression) for templates which should be processed with template mode RAW (e.g. *.raw - NOTE: extension needs to be enabled for this script engine).
